bio:
Revyn Sadri lives in Windhelm's Gray Quarter. Like the vast majority of the population in this part of the city, Revyn is a Dunmer. He is the proprietor of Sadri's Used Wares, working as a general goods merchant who buys and sells any variety of items. He is an eligible bachelor.
Despite annoying rumors about his shop, Revyn profusely denies buying and selling stolen goods, and goes as far as to return goods and items he suspects to have been stolen. Specifically, he may the player to secretly return a gold ring to the house of a wealthy older human woman named Viola Giordano, as he believes it was stolen from her.
He often patronizes the nearby New Gnisis Cornerclub (a cornerclub is the Dunmer equivalent of a tavern).
name: Revyn Sadri
